messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Having been brought up in Waddesdon in the 50s and 60s I was always exposed to a sense of community spirit, pride in the British nation and a sense of self belief. Sadly all things that seem to have gone. The shameful way we have been deceived about the EU, mass immigration, and locally, HS2, the Calvert incinerator and over development has been totally arrogant. If, like me, you despair at the way our country is run, vote for me on May 7th. Join the People's Army and together Britannia will rule again.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Expresses a negative sentiment towards the European Union (EU) and mass immigration, seeing it as part of the deception and arrogance.
Criticizes local over development and infrastructure projects such as HS2 and the Calvert incinerator.

issues.brexitEurope: The shameful way we have been deceived about the EU.
issues.governance: If, like me, you despair at the way our country is run, vote for me on May 7th.

housing.content: Over development has been totally arrogant.
